author: The Associated Press
title: NFL Capsules
text:
NFL Capsules Associated Press | 0 comments 
INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Tom Brady threw for 312 yards and three touchdowns and New England took advantage of a botched fake punt in the Patriots' 34-27 victory over the Indianapolis Colts on Sunday night. 
The Patriots improved to 5-0 for the first time since 2007. It was the first meeting between the rivals since the "Deflategate" storm erupted after the AFC title game in January. kAmu@C 2 92=7[ E96 E62>D EC2565 ;23D]k^Am kAmqFE }6H t?8=2?5 D6:K65 4@?EC@= :?
